text: avarkaḷukku niṉaivūṭṭappaṭṭa naṟpōtaṉaikaḷai avarkaḷ maṟantuviṭṭa pōtu, avarkaḷukku (mutalil) ellāp poruṭkaḷiṉ vāyilkaḷaiyum nām tiṟantu viṭṭōm - piṉṉar, avarkaḷukku koṭukkappaṭṭataik koṇṭu avarkaḷ makiḻcciyaṭaintu koṇṭirunta vēḷai (nam vētaṉaiyaik koṇṭu) avarkaḷai tiṭīreṉap piṭittuk koṇṭōm; appōtu avarkaḷ nampikkai iḻantavarkaḷāka ākiviṭṭaṉar
